Title: Anatidaephobia
Description:
The time has come, $n. Her new pet Iggy has been doing wonders for Rusziona's confidence, and now I think she's ready to face her biggest fear.

Ducks.

There is a tauren in the Waking Shores who is an expert at using pets to help heal trauma. I think she might be just what we need.

Lasztak and Rusziona will meet you there.
ObjectivesText: Help Rusziona and Iggy defeat a duck in a pet battle.

Objectives.Text: Defeat Wurallie in a Pet Battle with Iggy on your team
Meet Lasztak in The Waking Shores
